title: illume typography lamps
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714103325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/didotmerge2_5227.jpg)
  
_didot lamp—all four sides displayed_

**ABOUT THE COLLECTION.**

_illume_ is an elegant, modern collection of typography table lamps for anyone who enjoys lighting with class and personality. Each sleek, frosted white acrylic lamp celebrates a classic typeface while gracing a room with soft light and sophistication. Brighten your room with illume.

**CURRENT EDITION 1 COLLECTION FOR PURCHASE:**

Didot  
Bodoni **_sold_**  
Baskerville  
Clarendon  
Caslon **_sold_**  
Garamond

_\*lamps are each $158 US dollars_

**WANT AN ILLUME LAMP?**  
Purchase one of the current collection or put in a request for a specific classic typeface and/or letterform by contacting Whitney Wright. For more images, please visit [illume](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714103325/http:/fashiongraphics.net/works/wrightw/img509/).

**ABOUT THE DESIGNER.**

Growing up, while others drew pet portraits, Whitney designed letters. This childhood love of letters transformed into her burgeoning career as a graphic designer and status of typography nerd. Her favorite typeface is currently Univers. She is a Junior design major at MICA (Maryland Institute College of Art).
